title: SOLD: 1882 Harper's Weekly - Chicago (NL) Team Woodcut w/Cap Anson & King Kelly
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1882 Harper's Weekly - Chicago (NL) Team Woodcut w/Cap Anson & King Kelly
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very nice 1882 Harper's Weekly - Chicago (NL) Team Woodcut picturing Hall of Famers, Cap Anson & KIng Kelly. This beauty has been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
